SLFFF.summary: Future Mobility Solutions Limited, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and supplies small boats in New Zealand, the United States, Malaysia, Australia, the Middle East, Europe, and internationally. The company offers amphibious, foldable and semi-rigid, and rigid inflatable boats. It serves government, commercial, and recreational customers. The company was formerly known as Sealegs Corporation Limited and changed its name to Future Mobility Solutions Limited in January 2017. Future Mobility Solutions Limited was incorporated in 1987 and is based in Auckland, New Zealand.
